医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
外泌体封装的荧光传感器在阿尔茨海默病研究中实现先进的脑成像大脑中的神经递质水平可以表明大脑健康和阿尔茨海默病等神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Exosome-encapsulated-luminous-sensors-enable-advanced-brain-imaging-in-Alzheimers-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Exosome-encapsulated-luminous-sensors-enable-advanced-brain-imaging-in-Alzheimers-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47eb8ba4-4d6f-41fc-97f4-cd1d93aecc5f Wed, 31 Jul 2024 14:17:47 -0400 Exosome-encapsulated fluorescent sensors enable advanced brain imaging in Alzheimer's research
研究揭示了直接口服抗凝剂常见的超说明书用药情况数百万美国人服用抗凝剂，通常称为血液稀释剂。这些药物可以预防导致心脏病和中风的血栓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-common-off-label-dosing-of-direct-oral-anticoagulants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-common-off-label-dosing-of-direct-oral-anticoagulants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c7c7a85-b7f4-4b81-8457-cba719468650 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 14:12:47 -0400 Study reveals common off-label dosing of direct oral anticoagulants
MD 安德森及其合作者发起太空项目，探索微重力下 T 细胞的行为德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心及其合作者正在启动一个研究项目，将 T 细胞发送到国际空间站 (ISS)，以研究长期微重力对细胞分化、激活、记忆和疲劳的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/MD-Anderson-and-collaborators-initiate-space-project-to-explore-T-cell-behavior-in-microgravity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/MD-Anderson-and-collaborators-initiate-space-project-to-explore-T-cell-behavior-in-microgravity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9e31dc3-17f2-4e8e-9cf0-f68451886fe3 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 12:46:39 -0400 MD Anderson and collaborators initiate space project to explore T cell behavior in microgravity
COVID-19 风险计算器已更新，可评估一个人患上长期 COVID 的风险昆士兰大学领导和开发的 COVID-19 风险计算器已更新，可以确定一个人患上长期 COVID 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/COVID-19-Risk-Calculator-updated-to-assess-a-persons-risk-of-developmenting-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/COVID-19-Risk-Calculator-updated-to-assess-a-persons-risk-of-developmenting-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50ef35b8-824a-4fc3-b7cb-65e604733a14 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 12:29:12 -0400 COVID-19 Risk Calculator updated to assess a person's risk of developing long COVID
昆士兰大学研究显示，使用 Triple P 育儿计划的社区中，虐待儿童的情况下降了 25%昆士兰大学的研究表明，参与积极养育计划的社会弱势社区的虐待儿童案件有所减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/UQ-study-reveals-2525-drop-in-child-maltreatment-in-communities-using-Triple-P-Parenting-Program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/UQ-study-reveals-2525-drop-in-child-maltreatment-in-communities-using-Triple-P-Parenting-Program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7368527a-4412-4052-ae48-baede3d55890 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 12:24:37 -0400 UQ study reveals 25% drop in child maltreatment in communities using Triple P Parenting Program
从废物到品味：发酵食品的变革力量在圣地亚哥 2024 年 Pittcon 大会上进行的这次采访中，Maria Marco 讨论了她对发酵食品的健康益处、安全性和减少浪费潜力及其生产过程中涉及的微生物过程的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/From-Waste-to-Taste-The-Transformative-Power-of-Fermented-Foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/From-Waste-to-Taste-The-Transformative-Power-of-Fermented-Foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36fec9b4-1b57-4556-a6db-46abd15ee630 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 10:07:00 -0400 From Waste to Taste: The Transformative Power of Fermented Foods
干细胞治疗进展：间充质干细胞在治疗 COVID-19 和流感感染方面显示出潜力宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表新文章。包括病毒性人畜共患病在内的传染病的出现使得人们能够对新的治疗方法进行深入研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Stem-cell-therapy-advances-MSCs-show-potial-in-managing-COVID-19-and-influenza-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Stem-cell-therapy-advances-MSCs-show-potential-in-managing-COVID-19-and-influenza-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a582a8e-eb4b-416e-a7ea-12bae9321ea3 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:44:37 -0400 Stem cell therapy advances: MSCs show potential in managing COVID-19 and influenza infections
在 COVID-19 大流行期间，患有糖尿病的老年人面临着更高的抑郁风险最近一项针对 2,700 多名加拿大老年人的研究报告显示，患有糖尿病的老年人在 COVID-19 大流行期间面临着更高的抑郁风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Older-adults-with-diabetes-faced-elevated-risk-of-depression-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Older-adults-with-diabetes-faced-elevated-risk-of-depression-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=218b1080-4416-4852-927d-1f6aa58aef82 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:26:15 -0400 Older adults with diabetes faced elevated risk of depression during the COVID-19 pandemic
2024 年将成为“iPSC 年” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/2024-is-shaping-up-to-be-e2809cthe-year-of-iPSCse2809d.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/2024-is-shaping-up-to-be-e2809cthe-year-of-iPSCse2809d.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=762242e1-0033-494f-a2e4-f5e7b07a4c1e Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:07:00 -0400 2024 is shaping up to be “the year of iPSCs"
神经丝轻链被鉴定为帕金森氏症和路易体痴呆症的早期标志物通过监测淀粉样蛋白-β (Aβ) 和磷酸化 tau (p-tau) 蛋白，可以早期检测帕金森病和路易体痴呆中与阿尔茨海默病相关的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Neurofilament-light-chain-identified-as-early-marker-for-Parkinsone28099s-and-dementia-with-Lewy-Bodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Neurofilament-light-chain-identified-as-early-marker-for-Parkinsone28099s-and-dementia-with-Lewy-Bodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45c5d757-99a4-41bb-8009-841f46f145b7 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 08:48:31 -0400 Neurofilament light chain identified as early marker for Parkinson’s and dementia with Lewy Bodies
